abstract: The Wall Street protests represent a refusal to engage the worn-out ideologies rooted in the Cold War.
snippet: The Wall Street protests represent a refusal to engage the worn-out ideologies rooted in the Cold War.
lead_paragraph: Our language has not yet caught up with the political phenomenon that is emerging in Zuccotti Park and spreading across the nation, though it is clear that a political paradigm shift is taking place before our very eyes. It's time to begin to name and in naming, to better understand this moment. So let me propose some words: "political disobedience."
